mapper.update: UPDATE board_consulting SET btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT a.coun_no,a.gr_title,a.gr_content,a.gr_apply,a.gr_oper,a.total_num,a.con_cd, b.coun_name,b.email,b.mobile,b.address,a.img,a.sex,a.major,a.target,a.grade FROM group_consulting a, counselor b WHERE a.coun_no = b.coun_no AND gr_no = #{gr_no}
SELECT coun_name FROM counselor WHERE coun_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_consulting (coun_no,up_gr_no,gr_title,gr_content,gr_apply,gr_oper,total_num,round,img,sex,major,round) VALUES ((SELECT coun_no FROM counselor WHERE coun_id = #{g_counid}),#{up_gr_no},#{g_title}, #{gr_content},#{gr_apply},#{gr_oper},#{g_total},#{round},#{image},#{g_sex},#{g_major},#{round})
mapper.select: SELECT gr_no FROM group_consulting WHERE gr_title = #{title}
